collectors.title: Database
collectors.titleDetails: (32 total Queries, 32 of them unique across 1 Connection)

queries.sql: SELECT COUNT(*) as total FROM tbl_news n LEFT JOIN tbl_category c ON c.id = n.category_id LEFT JOIN tbl_subcategory s ON s.id = n.subcategory_id LEFT JOIN tbl_users u ON u.id = n.user_id LEFT JOIN tbl_languages l ON l.id = n.language_id WHERE n.title IS NOT NULL

SELECT n.*, c.category_name, s.subcategory_name, u.name, l.language FROM tbl_news n LEFT JOIN tbl_category c ON c.id = n.category_id LEFT JOIN tbl_subcategory s ON s.id = n.subcategory_id LEFT JOIN tbl_users u ON u.id = n.user_id LEFT JOIN tbl_languages l ON l.id = n.language_id WHERE n.title IS NOT NULL ORDER BY id desc LIMIT 0 , 10
